updates.text: NEL full svc has resumed. Free passing bus rides have ceased. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
17/06 7.41pm: NEL full svc has resumed. Free passing bus rides available between Farrer Pk & Hougang stn. We are sorry.
NEL svc is delayed due to power fault. Additional travel time of abt 15 minutes may be expected in both bounds. We are sorry.
